original_text: For anyone who curses his father or his mother shall surely be put to death; he has cursed his father or his mother; his blood is upon him.
korean_text: 만일 누구든지 자기의 아버지나 어머니를 저주하는 자는 반드시 죽일지니 그가 자기의 아버지나 어머니를 저주하였은즉 그의 피가 자기에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: For anyone who curses his father or his mother
shall surely be put to death
he has cursed his father or his mother
